attributes.action: ensure more rapid arrest and conviction of stalkers by providing the police with funding for Stalking Units in every borough, with a detective assigned to every case of stalking. Police at Stalking Units should be trained in all current and future technologies used by stalkers such as GPS satellite tracking, cyberstalking and remote surveillance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police should have funding for up-to-date technology for use in catching stalkers "in the act". Currently it is very difficult for police to arrest stalkers who are hiding and using hi-tech methods of stalking.
